settings_groups.headline: Orientation
settings_groups.info: This setting does not rotate the camera feed but actually flips the image like a mirror in the horizontal or vertical plane. Make your selection and press 'Apply'
settings_groups.warning: Camera feed will need to be restarted for this setting to be applied.

settings.name: Exposure Compensation
settings.info: , which adjusts the target of the AEC/AGC algorithm. Positive values increase the target brightness, and negative values decrease it. Zero represents the base or

settings.name: Exposure Time
settings.info: Exposure time for the sensor to use, measured in microseconds.
